descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Go for a Space Walk and feel the vastness of space with your Oculus Quest.

Three adventure levels:

The Earth: Exit the space shuttle and chill out, orbiting over any part of The Earth. Set the time-of-day to view sunrises and night lights. Complete challenges to recover satellites to the space shuttle.

Save The World! An asteroid is heading towards Earth. Navigate through the asteroid's tunnels to plant explosives and destroy it in a race against time. 15 levels with 3 levels of difficulty.

The Space Station: Float around the outside of the Space Station and view the fully working Canadarm remote arm and visiting HTV supply vessels. Complete a puzzle fixing solar panels - randomly different puzzle every time.

Not everyone is cut out to be an astronaut so if you suffer motion sickness in VR,  this app probably isn't for you. Turning off Earth position animations, using the trigger button to thrust in the direction you are looking and making slow turns will all help.
